page.title: 19 HOUSES - ESTATES
page.content: {Forches Estate}is a council estate of around 500 houses.They were built soon after 1945. {In Whidden}Valley there are over 600 new houses and bungalows built for people who work in factories there.Some are privately owned and some are council. {Gorwell}estate was built by the council in 1978.The houses are mainly 2 or 3 bedroomed and are semidetached. Most of the houses are council houses but some have been brought.Underneath Gorwell Road there is a subway which mainly only the old people use. {Goodleigh Rise}was built in 1977 and has approximately 120 houses, all the roads in the estate are named after composers. {Frankmash estate}was built between {1966}and{1968.}They are all attached houses.They have large gardens.
